name: Ngopi,Yuk! Webtoon-Coffee Shop Simulation
description:
Do you want to experience being a Barista in a traditional coffee shop? ☕

Would you like to hear stories or complaints from your costumers? 💬

Let's Play Ngopi, Yuk! ☕️

Ngopi, Yuk! is a Coffee Shop Simulation game adapted from the comic LINE Webtoon Indonesia which is set in Pontianak, West Borneo, Indonesia.🇮🇩

This game tells of a grandfather named Pak Gundul who prefers to buy a shophouse and open a coffee shop rather than living with his son in the city. This he did to commemorate his wife who had died because the shop was the first place they met.

FEATURES:

📍Make & serve coffee

📍Various Barista & Costumer Characters

📍Various Memento Characters

📍Relaxing Sound

📍Various Traditional Coffee Menu & Snack

📍Various & Unique Story

📍Daily Indonesian People Story

📍Various Decoration & Booster Items

📍Comic Art Style

📍There are Pantun too!

Your can get find CHARACTER SPECIAL or EASTER EGG!!

Adapted from the #1 Favorite LINE Webtoon Comic in Indonesia 🏆
